issue.title: Gazebo should time out quickly on connecting to model database at startup

content.raw:
Another possible speed up would be to use the same curl connection for fetching all model manifests at once rather than invoking a new connection for each model?

http://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/c/curl_easy_perform.html 
says that multiple files transfer is possible in the same connection.
content.html:
Another possible speed up would be to use the same curl connection for fetching all model manifests at once rather than invoking a new connection for each model?

http://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/c/curl_easy_perform.html says that multiple files transfer is possible in the same connection.
